name: 楊勝明
objective: 本課程的目的: 熟悉各種轉換器電路的原理, 學習轉換器電路設計實務, 學習電子電路製作, 實驗驗證轉換器的功能。
schedule:
1.   Introduction, 分組
2.   Laboratory equipment
3.   Lab 1: DC-AC converter, Bridge rectifier
4.   Lab 2: Boost DC-DC converter
5.   Experiments, (Lab2測驗)
6.   Lab 3: Buck DC-DC converter
7.   No class
8.   Experiments, (Lab3測驗)
9.   Mid-Exam week
10. Lab 4: Flyback DC-DC converter
11. Experiments, (Lab4測驗)
12. Lab 5: Boost PFC
13. Experiments, (Lab5測驗)
14. Introduction of Arduino
15. Lab 6: Full-bridge DC-DC converter
16. Experiments, (Lab 6測驗)
17. Lab 7: Full-bridge DC-AC inverter
18. Final exam week
scorePolicy:
實驗 (上課時檢查)：40%
實驗報告：20%
Exam：40% (5次測驗)
materials:
上課講義: 北科i學園
Reference: "Power Electronics", Daniel Hart, McGraw Hill, 東華
Lecture note
